If you're planing to play L4D with 3 friends then you should go for it.
If you're playing solo I wouldn't buy it.
- Full HD resolution support only with -full -h 1080 -w 1920 in startup options in steam of the game
+ still has Valve Official Server
+ there's an active playerbase so you can play solo multiplayer with randoms

I have been playing this game for a long time on two different platforms now, and I can honestly say that it never loses it's gaming value. I have loved it for thirteen long years, seeing as it was my very first Xbox 360 game, and continue to love and appreciate everything that it is. I have introduced so many people to this because it is one of the best ways to play together in a co-op setting. It is seriously the game that just keeps on giving.
still extremely fun to play with friends

Ya hace una década desde su lanzamiento y Left 4 Dead fue, sigue y seguirá siendo un increíble juego del género Zombies.
Modo cooperativo en línea, enfrentamiento (4 vs 4) o solitario con bots, puedes disfrutar de la experiencia que ofrece este título.
Cuenta con 6 campañas (de 2 a 5 capítulos por cada una) junto con la posibilidad de añadir tus propias campañas personalizadas mediante la funcion de los add-ons (consulta guías fiables para más información).
Si buscas un reto, prueba la dificultad Experto o el modo Supervivencia para probar tus dotes de superviviente al máximo.
Considera Left 4 Dead en tu biblioteca de Steam, no te arrepentirás :D.
